Articles.Content:
New here.. I ran into a new problem that hasn't happened to me before. Both hangars seem to be bugged. I try to make a new ship and none of the selections work. If I do click on one of the parts, it spawns on the ground. Please let me know a solution!

Texts on top of each other. Category Panels don't show up fully, especially when selected.

[http://imgur.com/A20Rq9i](http://imgur.com/A20Rq9i)

Parts spawn on ground

[http://imgur.com/fDkrjVo](http://imgur.com/fDkrjVo)
Hi tylerp2, please see the support stickies and provide your game logs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
How do I do both of that ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)
Look for the support threads at the top of this section, they explain where you can find your logs and how to upload them.

**KSP Version: 1.0.2**  **OSX Yosemite**

**What Happens: Hangar menus don't pop up, craft parts spawn on ground (can't drag them too).**

**Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock**

**Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:** 

**- Image Links:** [http://imgur.com/A20Rq9i](http://imgur.com/A20Rq9i) , [http://imgur.com/fDkrjVo](http://imgur.com/fDkrjVo)

**- Craft File if required**

**- Log File:**

SORT

do you want me to just copy and paste the whole log starting from when i first open ksp? i cant distinguish what's what and i tried looking up tutorials.
Upload a copy to a file hosting site like Dropbox or Google Drive, then link to it here.
